selectedVerses.text: But the next day he took the bed cloth and dipped it in water and spread it over his face, till he died. And Hazael became king in his place.
No one sews a piece of unshrunk cloth on an old garment. If he does, the patch tears away from it, the new from the old, and a worse tear is made.
And a young man followed him, with nothing but a linen cloth about his body. And they seized him,
I clothed you also with embroidered cloth and shod you with fine leather. I wrapped you in fine linen and covered you with silk.
And over the golden altar they shall spread a cloth of blue and cover it with a covering of goatskin, and shall put in its poles.
